data.title: Gerald Rulon-Maxwell
data.text:
Music Faculty Associate,

School of Music, Dance and Theatre

Long Bio

A native of Long Island, Mr. Rulon-Maxwell had been teaching and performing professionally in the valley since relocating to Arizona in 2005. He was hired as a faculty associate at Arizona State University in 2011 upon receipt of his master's in music education from ASU.

Education

Master's degree. Music Education, Arizona State University

CV

Research Interests

Jazz and popular music pedagogy and performance. Hip Hop history and pedagogy.
